title: Can't log in after patch.
body: I get and error when I first try to log in, then an endless "Authenticating" the second time. I can log in on my pre 30 smurf just fine though and there are others posting about the same problem on reddit.

replies.body:
Hi Guys, thanks for being patient with us. We have engineers looking at the problem right now. I do have a question for those having this issue: How many of you were in game and were kicked out? I'm trying to get a feel for how many folks are not able to get back in, or if this was your first time logging in. 

Let me know. Thanks for any info you can give.

We're still digging into the issue, but we did test the sub-30 account you all suggested when you mentioned your smurfs were logging in. It's given us a small lead. I'll get some updates here as we know more.

Thanks for that guys!

[Update] We know that some accounts are able to log in while others can't, but we still don't know what the defining difference with those accounts are. Not much to say here, but we're following any lead that makes sense at the moment. 

I hope to have more of an update in the next post.

[Update] We restarted the platform. Can anyone who had issues earlier try re-logging onto the server?

~~Seems to potentially be related to skins~~.

Someone apparently has around 4 skins on their account and still having issues.

Seems client related rather than account related. The client won't leave the authenticating screen, but people see us logged in.

We have a situation where:
1) accounts theoretically with less skins (i.e. low level accounts/smurfs) seem to have no trouble.
2) accounts' online status at the time of disconnection seem to be irrelevant (both parties are affected)
3) Friends are able to see us as online when we are on the "Authenticating screen".

To expand on point 3, the client even acts as though we have been logged in. For example, when we are on authenticating in the background and browsing the internet with google chrome as the active tab, the client flashes orange at a point as if to say something is happening, but then when you click the tab, nothing is going on, its still authenticating.

Good luck.
